findings.rationale: An indefinite term can lead to perpetual obligations, increasing liability and risk of non-compliance over time.
findings.evidence_quote: This Agreement shall remain in effect indefinitely and shall survive termination of any business relationship between the parties.

findings.rationale: A broad definition may lead to uncertainty regarding what information is covered, potentially leading to disputes.
findings.evidence_quote: Confidential Information means all non-public, proprietary or confidential information disclosed by the Disclosing Party...

findings.rationale: The obligation to return information may not cover all scenarios, potentially leaving the Disclosing Party at risk if information is not returned properly.
findings.evidence_quote: Upon termination, the Receiving Party shall return all Confidential Information to the Disclosing Party.
